reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress beautiful, with one noting it looks expensive, and appreciate its perfect length and flattering fit that hugs the body down to the thighs. The dress is comfortable, not itchy, and comes in vibrant colors with multiple color options. Customers find it versatile, suitable for both day and night events, and appreciate its sturdiness as the top stays in place without sliding down. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must buy
items.body: I love this dress so much I had to order 2 more colors. First- the material is high quality- the dress actually has 2 layers yet is still lightweight enough for a hot summer day. 2nd, the colors POP- they are so vibrant and design of flowers is clear and well made. 3rd- the fit. Like a glove. I felt so sexy and comfortable wearing this dress with wedges or flip flops - I am only 5”3 and usually dresses can be too long. This was perfectly to my ankle so I didn’t trip on it and could run barefoot if I wanted. I am not big chested so I always feel like with a strapless I have to keep pulling it up- not this dress. It was tight- in a good way- and I felt secure every minute. Don’t need to wear a bra but I chose to. I got so many compliments and questions on where I got the dress- I’m afraid now my whole neighborhood will be wearing it !! lol can’t beat the price, quality, design, fit, color choices. Bought a small. These aren’t the best pictures but you’ll see I’m having a grand ol time in this dress lol Read more
items.author: Steph O

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and very well made. Beautiful dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I'm 5'1" 110 pounds and went with my normal size of small which was true to size and a perfect fit. For the price this dress is very well made and good quality. It's made of a soft comfortable stretchy material and flows with the body. The outer material is mesh with a sewn in stretchy material that feels almost like satin. Very breathable. This dress is very flattering in all the right places and doesn't cling. The top elastic has a silicone material to hold in place and it doesn't fall down. I love the back slit. The length is just right and works for tall or short women. The colors are so vibrant and exactly as advertised. This dress is a great deal and very affordable. Perfect for the beach or to wear to a wedding. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Sarah Owen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most comfortable strapless dress
items.body: This dress hugs you in all the right places. I got the red so that my tan would look nice against it. Love all the color options and will definitely wear again when I know I want to wear something comfortable, stretchy, and sexy. I'm even 5'0 and the length is perfect for me. Read more
items.author: Ashley May

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Fav Floral Dress!!
items.body: It fit SO NICELY!! I have a square body and it made my body look great. I wore it for some birthday beach photos and I love the way the dress looked in them. Material was comfortable and not sheer at all. Color matched the dress and I found the length and fit to be perfect (i’m about 5’3 and 118lbs)!! Definitely true to size!! Would highly recommend this dress!!! Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute maxi
items.body: I love the brand PRETTYGARDEN and I’ve bought a lot of clothing off here from them. The sizing is always true to size, but this dress was a little bit tight. I always wear a medium, I’m 5 foot six, 155 pounds. The length is nice however it’s a bit cheap in the quality of material. I wouldn’t say it’s sheer, but it’s very thin. It has a minimal amount of stretching to it. The print was very pretty and vivid which I liked so that’s why I kept the dress. The price point was good so I decided to purchase, happy I did. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars STUNNING
items.body: fits like a glove and looks exactly as pictured!! it doesn’t slip or shift if i’m moving or anything!! it’s so soft and thin enough to be stretchy and breathable but thick enough to be transparent or cheap looking. color is vibrant and the dress hugs my body down to my thighs and loosens at the knees to allow for walking. 10/10 no notes at all Read more
items.author: Kayden Safavi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT SUMMER DRESS
items.body: This dress is EVERYTHING I hoped for and more! The floral print is vibrant but not too loud — it gives such a soft, feminine look that’s perfect for spring and summer. I wore it to a brunch and had three people ask where I got it! The fabric is lightweight and breathable, making it ideal for warm weather, but it’s not see-through at all. It hugs in all the right places and flows beautifully — super flattering without being tight. I especially love the waistline and how it gives that effortlessly put-together look. I’m 5'5" and about 170 lbs, and the fit was true to size. If you're on the fence, GET IT. You won’t regret adding this to your wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Jazzyymannn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: Fits great , it does not slip . The fabric is really nice and good quality . Great for warm weather . Read more
items.author: Christine Lino

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue Red Floral, Floral Purple Pink, Pink Floral, Green Floral, Navy Rose Red Flower, Brown Floral, Blue Pink Floral, Yellow Flower, White Orange Floral, Black Pink Flower, Eggplant Purple, Black Red Flower, Gradient Bean Paste, Dark Green Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
